<!-- Code generated from the comments of the DatasourceOutput struct in datasource/amazon/secretsmanager/secret/data.go; DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY -->

- `arn` (string) - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the secret.

- `name` (string) - The user-provided friendly name of the secret.

- `description` (string) - The user-provided description of the secret.

- `kms_key_id` (string) - The Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Master Key (CMK) associated with the secret.

- `id` (string) - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the secret.

- `tags` (map[string]string) - The list of user-defined tags that are associated with the secret.

- `policy` (string) - The resource-based policy document that's attached to the secret.
